channel.title: The Big Words I Know By Heart Radio Hour
channel.description: A program of rants, raves, faves, pet peeves, celebrity interviews, personal vendettas and anything else I can fill the hour with. Oh! And ocassionally, there will be some relentless promotional plugs.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Not For The Meek....
channel.itunes:author: tom waters
